entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023
